item.title: How to enable automated captions in zoom.us
item.description:
There are some times you may need to generate automated captions in zoom.us online meetings, and zoom.us also officially support this amazing feature. However, it is default to disabled so you need to manually enable it firstly. The below are steps to enable it quickly:

Step 1: Login to https://zoom.us and then navigate your profile settings page, or you can click this link directly.

Step 2: Scroll down your page until the In Meeting (Advanced) section, you can see there are two settings, one is Manual captions and the other is Automated captions, enable both of them like my screenshot.
